collision_penalty.description: Controls the character's 'timidity' towards future collisions.

penetration_penalty.description: A multiplier applied to the penalty for ongoing penetrations.

wall_following_angle.description: Maximum angle between wall following direction and sideways direction.

dodging_penalty.description: A multiplier applied to the penalty for motion perpendicular to the desired velocity.

velocity_hysteresis.description: Preference for continuing along the same velocity when another velocity candidate scores more highly.

sidedness_changing_penalty.description: Unwillingness to change the side on which an agent plans to pass another agent.

weight.description: The character's resistance to dodging other characters.
